METAVERSE MAKERS ORGANIZATION

We are artists, creatives, and coders on a mission; Show the World the open metaverse with the sickest creator-driven web3 products.

WE BELIEVE

The metaverse should be a connected web of interoperable worlds; a medium controlled by creators and accessed through free and open tools.

The only way it will happen is if we show the way to the open metaverse with stunning technology, applications, experiences and drops.

WEBAVERSE: METAVERSE ENGINE

Wouldn't it be great to have a 100% open source web3 metaverse engine that anyone can host; an engine that could shift the power from a few big tech companies to users and creators? And what if it could load any NFT from the web3 with slick avatar rigging for AR/VR and much more?

We thought it would be kind of cool. So, we made it.
